actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to a second strategic arms limitation agreement with the Soviet Union.

summary.text: Declares the sense of the House of Representatives that the failure of the Soviet Union to comply with international agreements to which that country is a signatory, and the increased involvement by the Soviet Union in military activities, raise doubts with respect to the sincerity of the Soviet Union concerning a second strategic arms limitation agreement, and that the President, at this time, should not enter into a new strategic arms limitation agreement with the Soviet Union until the Soviet Union honors its commitments.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to a second strategic arms limitation agreement with the Soviet Union.
